casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Gray, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Gray (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 214.]

(No. 98-2159 Submitted November 10, 1998 Decided December 30, 1998.) Mark E. Mulligan, Ottawa County Prosecuting Attorney, and Paul Skaff, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

The certification of conflict by the Court of Appeals for Ottawa County is accepted.

*215The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

The trial court’s finding that Daniel Gray is a sexual predator is reinstated.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Resnick, J., not participating.
